Class Racer

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Racer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RacerAPI

    public class Racer
extends java.lang.Object
implements RacerAPI
    Class representing a racer in the game.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean equals(java.lang.Object o)

      Returns the number of times this RacerAPI has crashed.

      Returns the integer value of the current checkpoint zone this RacerAPI is in.
      java.util.List<Point> getImpossibleNextPoints(RacetrackAPI racetrack, boolean ai)
      Get all 9 next possible positions that the Racer could move to based only on its current position and velocity, not nearby vertex traversability Then use getPossibleNextPoints() to eliminate possible points and return only impossible ones
      Point getNextCentralPoint()
      Gets the next Point from the RacerAPI's current position and given its velocity remains the same

      Get the Racer's current route of visited points as an ordered list

      Get the Racer's current grid coordinates on the Racetrack in cartesian space

      Get the next possible positions that the Racer could move to based on its current position, velocity, and nearby vertex traversability
      int getScore()
      Returns this RacerAPI's score (number of points visited + crashes).
      Vect getVelocity()
      Get the Racer's current velocity in terms of a horizontal X component, and a vertical Y component
      int hashCode() 
      boolean isFinished()
      Get the Racer's current race status as to whether they have finished or not
      void killVelocity()
      Reduces the RacerAPI's velocity to 0 horizontal and 0 vertical.
      void moveWhilstApplyingEffects(RacetrackAPI racetrack, Point destinationBeforeEffects)
      Evaluates the next destination that the Racer should be in after applying Terrain effects from any Tiles it has traversed between its current position and its probationary destination

      Increment the current zone.

                                                   boolean ai)
        Description copied from interface: RacerAPI

        Specified by:
        getPossibleNextPoints in interface RacerAPI
        Parameters:
        racetrack - the RacetrackAPI that this RacerAPI is currently on
        ai - whether or not this RacerAPI's PlayerAPI is an AI or not
        Returns:
        a list of Points representing the next possible positions in no particular order

      • getImpossibleNextPoints

        public java.util.List<Point> getImpossibleNextPoints(RacetrackAPI racetrack,
                                                     boolean ai)
        Description copied from interface: RacerAPI
        Get all 9 next possible positions that the Racer could move to based only on its current position and velocity, not nearby vertex traversability Then use getPossibleNextPoints() to eliminate possible points and return only impossible ones
        Specified by:
        getImpossibleNextPoints in interface RacerAPI
        Parameters:
        racetrack - the RacetrackAPI that this RacerAPI is currently on
        ai - whether or not this RacerAPI's PlayerAPI is an AI or not
        Returns:
        a list of Points represnting the next "impossible" positions in no particular order

        Specified by:

        Parameters:

        destinationBeforeEffects - the probationary position of the Racer before effects are applied, used to evaluate the resultant position
